channel.title: Grim reaper
channel.description: i have a delta source and i would like to know how to makeit so when you weild the scythe you can become grim ? ty for posting

item.title: Grim reaper
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

oh gosh…

public int grimReaper = 0;

//SIDE NOTE TOO THIS CODE YOU CAN’T BECOME MORE THEN ONE NPC THIS WAY…
//KINDA BUGS OUT.

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == WeaponIdHere && grimReaper == 0) {

npcId = 3060;//Put NpcId Here
npcId2 = 3060;//Put NpcId Here

isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
grimReaper = 1;
} else if (grimReaper == 1 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != WeaponIdHere) {
isNpc = false;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
grimReaper = 0;
}

Read full topic
